nodes.text: In 3 ABY, the shadowport known as Abek's Station was destroyed by the Strike-class medium cruiser Ion Storm, under the command of Commander Surlev of the Galactic Empire. Surlev was searching for the mercenary Limna Yith, who had been leaving a trail of blood and destruction throughout the Sisar Run. When he tracked her to the space station, he received approval from Governor Skreeg to destroy it. He did so, but Yith escaped.
